author: Ben Gao
title: tail vs structural recursion purpose
question:
Are tail and structural recursion essentially the same. Just 2 ways of doing the same thing,
or
does Tail recursion allow us to solve some problems structural recursion can't?
student_answer: Check out @879 for a good review of structural vs tail recursion.
instructor_answer: Also check out @852, @875, @880, and @883 for more (the latter three likely are the most useful).
